result.reason: Feature request for dynamic/virtual connection groups that auto-populate based on criteria like connected status or recent usage, improving navigation in large connection lists.
result.approach: Add virtual smart group nodes to the connection tree that dynamically filter connections by criteria (currently connected, recently used, by protocol). Requires tracking last-used timestamps on ConnectionInfo and a SmartGroup model with filter predicates rendered as read-only tree nodes.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Feature request for dynamic/virtual connection groups that auto-populate based on criteria like connected status or recent usage, improving navigation in large connection lists.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionTreeWindow.cs","mRemoteNG/Tree/ConnectionTreeModel.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInfo.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionTree/ConnectionTree.cs"],"approach":"Add virtual smart group nodes to the connection tree that dynamically filter connections by criteria (currently connected, recently used, by protocol).
